name: Danielle Lee
bio: Product leader with 10+ years of experience scaling B2B SaaS companies from seed to Series C. Passionate about education and building tools that empower creators.

name: Kenji Tanaka
bio: Kaggle Grandmaster and AI researcher focused on applying deep learning to medical imaging. Previously at Google Brain. Looking for a mission-driven healthtech venture.

name: Maria Garcia
bio: Serial entrepreneur and full-stack developer. Built and sold two mobile apps with over 1M downloads. Now seeking a co-founder for a new consumer social idea.
